TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi sealed beforefieldinit FontStretch extends System.ValueType implements class System.IFormattable

Docs.summary: Describes the degree to which a font has been stretched compared to the normal aspect ratio of that font.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 字型自動縮放描述的字型形式自動縮放從其一般的外觀比例，這是原始的寬度與高度比率指定字型中字符的程度。 值會對應至`usWidthClass`中的定義[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_opentype](~/includes/tla2sharptla-opentype-md.md)]規格。 `usWidthClass`代表整數值介於 1 到 9，較低的值表示較窄的寬度; 較高的值表示更廣的寬度。 |字型自動縮放|usWidthClass|一般的 %| |------------------|------------------|-----------------| ||1|50.0%| ||2|62.5%| ||3|75.0%| ||4|87.5%| ||5|100.0%| ||6|112.5%| ||7|125.0%| ||8|150.0%| ||9|200.0%| 如需詳細資訊[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_opentype](~/includes/tlasharptla-opentype-md.md)]`usWidthClass`值，請參閱["字型檔案表格 >](http://www.microsoft.com/typography/otspec/otff.htm)一節[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_opentype](~/includes/tla2sharptla-opentype-md.md)]規格。 ## XAML Attribute Usage ```

Docs.returns: An value that represents the relationship between the two instances of .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當傳回的值小於零，`left`是小於`right`。 當此值為零時，表示兩個運算元相等。 小於或等於零的值時，它會指出`left`大於`right`。
